Title: Ancient Inscriptions
Text:
The path lies hidden within the blessings... The messengers, though extraordinary, are not without flaws. To proceed, one must present that which can heal their hearts.

The messenger on the left has lost their way, unable to escape the mire.
The messenger in the center is scarred by betrayal, their heart sealed because of it.
The messenger on the right has achieved nothing, forever consumed by doubt.

Present your qualities before them to restore their wholeness.

(Below the inscription are drawings of three human figures in different poses, labeled "Loyalty," "Guidance," and "Recognition." These could be clues to solving the puzzle.)
